author: Nicole Carpenter
title: Sony donating $100 million to COVID-19 relief
description: PlayStation parent company Sony Corp. announced on Thursday that it’s creating a $100 million COVID-19 global relief fund to support those impacted by the novel coronavirus pandemic. Support will be divided between three areas: medicine, education, and the cr…
content: Sony Corp. has created a $100 million COVID-19 global relief fund to support people impacted by the novel coronavirus pandemic. The fund will be divided among three main areas, the company said in a news release: assistance for those individuals engaged in fr… [+1476 chars]
